text: @marcorubio CCP is trying to make Wuhan virus infect the world, and then they will pretend to know nothing. Now the world is infected by the virus. "Let's our great CCP to save the world." They are doing this to Japan and South Korea!  Let the world ignore the virus is made by CCP!
